entry.title: STRONG UPPER RIDGE BRINGING STABLE WEATHER/CLEAR CONDITIONS
entry.summary: November 26, 2024 4:00 a.m. A strong upper-level ridge will bring stable weather and clear conditions from midweek into at least the weekend in the region. Forecasters at the National Weather Service in Medford said daytime highs across southern Oregon will warm to or just above seasonal norms. Nighttime lows will cool slightly as skies...

entry.title: FREE FISHING DAYS ON FRIDAY AND SATURDAY
entry.summary: November 26, 2024 3:05 a.m. Free fishing days in Oregon are this Friday and Saturday, right after Thanksgiving. An Oregon Department of Fish and Wildlife release said everyone can fish, clam and crab for free. No fishing/shellfish licenses or tags are required for those two days. Both Oregon residents and nonresidents can fish for free....

entry.title: ROSEBURG BIG LOTS TO PERMANENTLY CLOSE IN JANUARY
entry.summary: November 2024 3:40 a.m. In the KQEN Business Spotlight: The Roseburg Big Lots store will permanently close in January.
